info.title: Tekton Hub
info.description: HTTP services for managing Tekton Hub

get.description: Find resources by a combination of name, kind, catalog, categories, platforms and tags

parameters.name: catalogs
parameters.description: Catalogs of resource to filter by

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Category associated with a resource to filter by

parameters.name: kinds
parameters.description: Kinds of resource to filter by

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags associated with a resource to filter by

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description: Platforms associated with a resource to filter by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of resources to be returned

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: Strategy used to find matching resources

get.description: Find a resource using its version's id

parameters.name: versionID
parameters.description: Version ID of a resource's version

get.description: Find resources using name of catalog, resource name and kind of resource

parameters.name: pipelinesversion
parameters.description: To find resource compatible with a Tekton pipelines version, use this param

get.description: Fetch a raw latest resource yaml file using the name of catalog, resource name, and kind
Find resource using name of catalog & name, kind and version of resource
Fetch a raw resource yaml file using the name of catalog, resource name, kind, and version
Find resource README using name of catalog & name, kind and version of resource
Find resource YAML using name of catalog & name, kind and version of resource
Find a resource using it's id
Find all versions of a resource by its id
List all resources sorted by rating and name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of resources to be returned

get.description: JSON document containing the API swagger definition
